Well, I've had some great rolls in the hay!

The Harlot is attractive, seductive, cunning, and personable. She trades her skills, body, and companionship for gold and is proud to be an independent contractor. In battle, she can rely on her fan-blades and supports the party with buffs that may change a battle's dynamic. It's easy for clients to fall in love with her, but for her it's strictly business.

The Harlot's unique fan-blades are her weapon of choice. Quite deadly when used as a slashing weapon, they can also be used as a projectile weapon. They need regular sharpening and care. The Harlot enjoys flirting with the Blacksmith, who is easily embarrassed by the Harlot's immodest dress.

The Harlot is adapatable and can go from entertaining royalty to roughing it in the wild, however, she has acquired a taste for the finer things in life, including fine cognac and a feather bed. When camping she can relieve stress, protect others from diseases, and offer her suggestive encouragements.

On Kill:
Heart of Gold
I never leave home without one.
I can help you put it on.
We’re not doing IT without one.
Do you come ... here often?
Is that a trinket in your pocket? or are you just happy to see me?
Want to see a new trick I learned?
*Gasp* So ... BIG!
Add ‘nother gold and I’ll use my mouth.
Let’s go have some 'alone'time, hee hee!
Five gold and I’m yours for the night.
Let me put myself together.
I must touch-up my makeup.
Excuse me, my hair needs to be fixed!
All those Johns, to meet my end like this? *sigh*
Beautiful, But Deadly!

This attractive Harlot seems coifed and confident as she enters the Hamlet. She is seductive and witty and is eager accept gold for an unforgettable night. She can inspire lust in a hardened man or a lonely woman.
Passion For Sale
For the right price, this Harlot is willing to show you a good time.
The smell ... it resembles another smell I know.
Tasty! And good for the libido!
A fine treat! This should relax me.
Worse than Brothel Booze!
Utterly revolting!
I prefer Cognac.
If there's nothing better!
This isn't too bad.
I've had worse!!
This is not enjoyable bondage!
You must get me out of this pot!
I can enjoy pain, but this is ridiculous!
She is even more beautiful than me!
Now I serve another mistress!
Seduction is a powerful weapon.
Sorry, I can't work for a madame!
I'm better an an independent operator!
It's best if I work for myself only.
I had a client who enjoyed chains.
We haven't established a safeword yet!
I wish I could enjoy this!
A refreshing heal.
I know your desires!
I am refreshed!
It's all too much for me!
My heart longs for my lost love!
The end of my clients happiness! They better not go to Rita!
I've had a lot of adventures!
I never recovered after I lost him …
Flesh is weak!
Rita is going to get my client base!
You will miss the soft touch of my body!
One last roll in the hay?
It was too much pain!
I'll pinch my nipples 'til it hurts.
The final pain is for me.
You weren't the best, that's for sure!
You’re a terrible lover!
You don't know anything about women!
It was work, but I enjoyed it!
Is this my last time to replenish the course?
My heart skips a beat!
My broken heart never recovered.
Is this the last embrace?
Was it wrong to leave him at the alter?
I should have never eaten raw fish!
All people are prositutes
Rita is always up to something!
It can be a lousy profession.
A soft breathe on your neck …
Am I not young enough, pretty enough, bold enough?
My crime will be discovered!
You will only use me, you don’t really care for me.
I'm not sure. Is that even legal?
I want it harder!
I can take it all!
Give me more! Give me more!
You don’t know how to handle a woman!
With your face, you'll have to pay extra!
That is NOT going to satisfy any partner!
I am skilled at superficiality!
What about my pleasiure? My needs?
By the Light, go faster!
My clients don't care for me, just want I do for them.
It's not how I wanted my life to go!
My body will fail me some day.
I should have become a baker!
Why didn't I listen to my mother?
Do you think I could be a profesional dancer
Hooking made me who I am!
The craft of seduction is powerful.
Great courtesans in history were very knowledgeable.
Courage means loving yourself.
We shall overcome, and I will love again!
My bed has seen bigger monsters than this!
Concentrate on the task only, turn off your feelings.
It's just a job like any other.
Being a woman is a joyous state!
I can make you feel wonderful.
There's nothing to fear from enjoying your body!
Most people sell sex, I just happen to charge for it!
Sex can make your feel alive!
After this, you can join me in my bed!
Blood will pump and you will pump and I will pump!
I remember that one client. ...
You need a great mind for great seduction.
A climatic rush of adrenaline!
Let me show you how to relax a bit …
I can show you all a good time!
A kiss and a wink can get you far!
Hey there sailor, buy me a drink? (winks)
Flesh wants what it wants.
I can stoke unknown desires!
This will make your body surge with power!
I know how to bring peace and harmoney to a a body!
Love is all we need!
My work makes me vigorous!
I can go all night, darling!
We can get started again in just a minute!
We may end our run here!
You won't feel my mouth there again!
You better not have genital warts!
If they find out it was me …
Are you with the authorities?
Don't you think I'm beautiful?
Pain can be plesaureable!
The tip of the whip is what I crave.
Pleasure and pain are very similar.
That's what you have to work with?
I will not lighten your burden again!
You can't afford my time!
Focus on my needs!
Hey! At least I'm not an astrologer, such a joke!
Lie back and think of the Light!
I lost my love and I shall never find another.
I had to whore my body out to stay alive.
How wonderful my life was when you were in the world …
Beauty is fleeting, but dumb is forever!
Rita is probably strealing my clients as we speak.
If I get wounded I may lose my beauty.
What is there is no end to the hooking up?
What I never feel true love again?
I must hide!
We should run. Are you listening? We should run now!
Do you hear that? Let me back!
Are they coming for me??
Let me through this instant!
I can take a whipping!
Hit me instead!
Let me get a better look!
Should I move up here?
I need to take point position.
Should I move back here?
It doesn't matter where I stand, we may all die yet!
Make way, surely, I'll catch something if I stay up front.
In front or in back, it matters not.
Is it immoral to sell love?
Love or Lust? Am I a just a Liar?
Is my soul doomed?
I can't get my purity back.
I can only stay in the position so long …
I need to survive, I don't care about the rest of you.
Let me see! I can figure this out best.
I've learned how to be charming and clever.
Hands off my body!
I need to step back for a moment.
Let me gather my thoughts, I need a moment.
I won't do that for you.
Not unless you've been tested.
We ware not doing that without protection!
I'm not sorry, but that's not in my scope of work.
Aren't I the best you've ever had?
Are you getting tired of me already?
Can you Please finish, I am getting tired of this!
Don't take all night, I do have other clients.
Listen you need to pay for additional time, I'm not your girlfriend.
Am I losing my beauty?
Time will turn my body's beauty!
What's love got to do with it?
I'm sick of youtelling me what to do mother!
Do nuns fall in love?
Rita always was trying to take me love.
I don't want to be forced to do this, rather I choose my clients!
I don't mind men, and I don't mind women either!
Will on old trick do me harm?
I trade my body for money.
I'll do what I want, when I want to. It's not up to you!
I needp ain to feel alive.
A cucumber could give me more pleasure!
I bet you are a terrible lover!
I won't kiss you there, sorry buddy.
It's my body I will do as I please with it.
I can'[t risk getting pregnant.
I do need supplies, perfurm, lipstick and more.
Flesh, flesh, and more flesh, but what about my soul?
All this hooking, and I barely make it.
I understand what people need, and I don't judge.
Slice them with my fan-blades
My mother knew I would end up a bad seed!
Protect me!
Things aren't going well? Can't you see that?
You better have the gold to pay up.
Nothing is free, nothing at all.
What if they come back? *looks around nervously*
Is this Rita's doing?
I'd prefer a nice hotel to this campsite! Have you smelled yourselves lately? I have!
I can take it, but can you give it?
You're starting to annot me.
I should have stayed in a brothel, adventuring is hard work!
You couldn't PAY me to kiss you.
You think that's a special performance? What a joke!
I'm not your girlfriend, wife or mother!
I need some alone time. Let's reevulate our relationship.
I have a terrible headache!
I'm sorry, not tonight.
There is no cheer here.
I'm not sure we'll make until morning.
I had a good man once…
A little flour, a little sugar, a little vanilla.
Sex, lies, and gold are all you need to succeed!
Are we being followed? I've got guys that can't take no for an answer.
Bring me the pain! Bring me the please!
I will suffer!
I'm a lady and a tramp!
Might as well be me.
I'll let them take me, it's no bother.
Come for me, ravish me!
Just try to catch me!
My mother always knew when I was lying.
Come for me boys, I dare you!
You want me. Don't deny it!
You wanna feel them?
I am open at all sorts fun activities!
You will enjoy this!
A little pain can be a little pleasure!
There more to it then just sticking it in!
You should really practice more on your technique!
Take a look at my fans!
My nails can scratch!
Hey listen up! You should defend me first! Are you listening?
Me! ME! It should be about me!
Hardened lives make it hard to feel.
Why did my life take this path?
I should be ashamed, but I'm not!
I will slash my own wrists!
Mom, I'm so sorry if I let you down!
So much kissing, but no love!
Will I see my love in the netherworld?
We are staying here and finishing this!
I will stay and fight!
I'm not leaving, I don't care what happens!
No. I am not a coward.
They will just find us later, so vote stay and fight on!
Running away won't solve anything, trust me.
Stay here. Take the pain!
I need to feel steel on my skin.
The pain reminds me who I am.
You won't share my bed tonight!
Sorry hun, that's not going to happen.
Excuse me? I don't beelive running away will help!
I can't let my fear overcome me!
I need to snap out of it!
What if a client comes for me?
Oh gods! Is that crow's feet?
Am I not beautiful enough? AM I NOT BEAUTIFUL ENOUGH?!!
Rita can barely wrangle a garden snake…
You only want to see my beauty tarnished!
Is this how you get off, you deviant?
I'll play my role well!
Well I suppose I must pleasure myself!
Harder! Harder!
The beauty in being black and blue!
I've been bad…I deserve this…
It's just a love touch.
How sweet, is that for me?
They evaded my charms!!
I'm losing my touch!
I missed the mark!
I can't slip up! One wrong move!
I'm all washed up…
They've found an opening!
Hit me like you mean it!
Your mistress demands you hit her!
You toy with my pleasure, fiend!
Was that a love note that just flew by?
Blowing me a kiss?
Trying to get a girl's attention?
Gone limp already!?
I expected you to last longer!
I'm not finished with you yet!
I bet you are a terrible lover!
You couldn't satify a dead fish!
Impotent on the battefield and in bed!
Let me blow you a kiss!
I've smudged some lipstick on your face.
Have you been seeing Rita?!
Eeeek. Spiders, stomp them!!
I don't want to die here!
What happened you?!
Maybe we should retreat?
That was supposed to hit!
Who are you trying to impress?
Are you trying to dissappoint me again?!
Can't shoot straight, eh?
What an imbecile!
Psh! Let me show you how it's done!
Must I do everything myself?
Hah! This isn't the first time I've been let down!
D-don't steal my luck!
They always come back with vengence!
N-now you've made it angry!
Promise you'll do the same to me!
You're getting me hot underneath the collar!
I want to see blood! Hit it again!
I guess you're not as much as a limp lamb as I thought!
I doubt you can do that again!
Finally found your vigor again, hmm?
That's a paying customer!
I wouldn't throw them out of bed!
Not so rough!
They've got it in for you!
Let me hide behind you!
You can only be lucky for so long!
You won't last much longer!
Are you trying to make it attack me too?!
I think I might faint!
I think they fancy you!
True love flew your way!
Love cuts deeper than the sharpest knife!
I'm staying right where I am!
It's too dangerous to move!
I'm a lady in waiting!
You aren't a copper, I'm not moving!
And do what? DIE?!
I won't do a thing you say!
And miss the sweet pleasure of pain?
No! I need a little spanking!
I refuse! Not until I see blood!
I'm not moving a muscle!
You want to boss me around? Pay me!
Touch me again and I'll gut you!
What on earth are you trying to give me?
I think not!
Keep that away from me!
No! I like the pain I'm feeling!
Oooh? Something to enhance my pleasure?
Will you punish me if I don't accept?
Don't waste this on a woman like me…
I just want to stare at my locket…
I'm already a fallen woman…
That's not my perfume!
I only accept love notes.
That's not a sheep-skin jimmy!
I'm getting out of here!
Even a whore knows when it's time to bow out!
Shall we retreat?
Why are you behind me?!
The coppers are here!
Don't mind me, just running away!
Don't blame me for looking out for myself!
It's a dog eat dog world, sweetheart.
A whore has to look out for herself!
My blood is feeling good and hot!
Oooh! That's got my blood pumping!
Why don't you come a little closer…
How about YOU give 'em a kiss!
I bet you don't have the stones to face them!
I'm surrounded by such deviants!
All dressed up and nowhere to go…
(sigh) Mother was right…
What have I done with my life?
Shall we dance?
You're stepping on my skirt!
Stop looking at my backside!
You put your bare hand on that?!
Even I know not to touh that!
It's a wonder you havn't gotten syphilis yet...
You didn't pay me enough last time! Mine!
That's a gift for me, I presume?
That better be payment for I did for you last night!
Oh, how long and sharp!
I can think of a few uses for that, hee hee!
Oooh? Is it dangerous?
Is that where my love notes went?
We should all probably wash our hands after this.
Did I miss place my little black book?
Oh! Even the dungeon loves me!
What a lovely feeling, no?
Ah! They're excited to meet us!
I never do think things through…
I need to look more before I leap…
Sigh, I deserved that…
Hmm…must've been the wind…
Is that a suitor at the door?
There is often pain my profession.
Are you trying to kiss me?!
I am NOT your paramour! Hands off!
Keep your hands where I can see them!
I will not deny myself such pleasure!
Stop! I'm so c-close! (shivers)
Oh, don't kill the mood!
I don't want to be touched…
I doubt you can heal my heart…
No, I should be punished for leaving him…
I haven't told you my rates, yet!
Exhibition costs extra.
Not in the middle of battle, you deviant!
Are you trying to kiss me?!
I am NOT your paramour! Hands off!
Keep your hands where I can see them!
I've already got my blood flowing!
No! That's not the pleasure I need!
That doesn't feel right!
Don't you dare pity me!
You're not helping!
I don't need your charity!
I haven't told you my rates, yet!
Exhibition costs extra.
Not in the middle of battle, you deviant!
Oof! That wasn't a love tap.
Not every whore likes it rough, you know!
That's one way to get the blood flowing…
It's rude to waste time on the battlefield and the bedroom.
I like to take my time too, but this is ridiculous…
Hurry up, love! More nasties want to join!
My heart feels so heavy and alone!
Can I only experience love but never give it?
He died waiting for me at the alter!
Don't let him light it!
Hurry before he lights it again!
We must stop him before he lights the fuse!
Private dance when we get back to the Hamlet?
Don't tell anyone, but you're one of my favorite customers.
Let me take your mind off of this horrid mission.
…and here's a kiss to make it better.
Lay your head on my bosom. You'll feel much better.
Let me know if I'm putting on too much pressure.
I know what'll give you some pep in your step! (giggles)
Come dance with me by the fire!
A nice bath is waiting for us when we get back to the Hamlet.
At least I lived life with few regrets!
I m-might be a little in over my head.
Not the "bang" I was expecting to go out on!
I'm not in the mood!
I'm off the clock!
I said, NO!
Quit starring at me!
I said, NO!
You remind me of a copper!
Come closer, I'm holding a knife.
Your Misstress is displeased.
As your Mistress, I doubt you can handle it!
I wouldn't touch you for all the money in the world!
You've got the face only mother could love.
Upon consideration, I've just raised my rates.
Upon consideration, I've just raised my rates.
I doubt you have much in that coin-purse of yours.
Not even if you were the last person on earth.
I'm not feeling it, sweetheart…
I have a headache…
I've got too much on my mind…
Not until you write me a love letter.
I can smell Rita on you!
I don't give discounts.
I said, NO!
Keep your hands where I can see them!
Hands off the goods!
No! You're too gentle!
You could never satisfy me!
I'm too much for you!
Not until you pay me first!
I'll slice your hand off with my fan!
Don't even think about it!
Not in mood, love…
I want to be alone right now…
Do you think he's moved on?
You have a jimmy?
Are you asking me to dance?
You should get that sore checked out…
Stew, again? I'll pass…
Who cooked this?
I'm not eating that!
I'm hungry for something else, hehe…
Food won't satisfy me!
My "hunger" is insatiable!
I lost my appetite…
Not hungry…
You can have my ration…
Where’s the potatotes?!
Aren't you hungry for something else? (winks)
I'm watching my figure!
Care to RISE to the occasion?
Now say, "Yes, Mistress!"
Am I distracting you? Hee hee!
The most fun I've had with my clothes on!
Aw, is it your first time? (snickers)
Over so soon?
